title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Intensive Focus on Math Simulation-Based Sustainable e-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic calculus and algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can describe the three core components of the e-learning ecosystem framework: pedagogy, technology, and management.
Learners can solve mathematical modeling problems in VR simulation environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can suggest sustainable learning resource management plans through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
